title: Drawing, George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Bathroom, 1934
title_raw: George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Bathroom
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: SCALE 1/2"=1'-0"; inscribed in graphite, lower right: SCHEDULE, Toilet Relocated/New Bidet/Furred Ceiling/Remove Lavatory/New Rad./New Rad. Enclosure/New Med. Cab. & Shelf/White Rubber Floor ['New Linoleum' crossed out]/New Linoleum Walls/Remove Plaster Dado/Mirror back of Tub/Furred at Tub/Remove Pipe chase/New Lighting Fixture/New Venetian Blind/New Towel Bars./Elec. Outlets/New Tub/Removing Tile Dado/Paint Ceiling/New door and buck/gold leaf Ceiling/and Tub soffit glazed/Patch Floor before laying Rubber Tile; inscribed in graphite with materials, instructions throughout
description: Elevations, plan, and schedule for bathroom. Entrance to bathroom on upper right wall; rectangular sink with rounded edges on right wall near door. Vanity mirror above sink with built in medicine cabinet with mirror front and gold-plated frame; glass shelf. Horizontal and rectangular light above mirror. Cabinet to left of sink. Radiator below window on far wall; hamper to the left of window. Bidet on upper left wall with paper holder to left of bidet. Toilet to left of bidet; white rubber tile floor below. New tub on near wall with shower head mounted on wall; mirrored wall behind tub, framed in aluminum. Linoleom walls with wood molding near ceiling.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Bathroom, 1934. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. 
Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-513
